subject: Re: Lumen Contact
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Do we have an email from Toby stating this? That is all we would need to proceed. If not, we can reach out and ask him for his written permission.

	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 


On Wed, May 14, 2025 at 1:41?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Detective John�s spoke to Toby who is a regional manager for Lumen and they confirmed we can use their pole. Here is the contact information to complete that process.  They were very supportive of the idea.  

	Derek

	Detective D. DeWitt
	Financial Crimes Unit
	Special Weapons and Tactics Team
	Eugene Police Department
	300 County Club Road
	Eugene, OR 97401
	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
	Work Celll � 541-743-6192
________________________________

	From: JOHNS Aaron R <AJohns@eugene-or.gov AJohns@eugene-or.gov >
	Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 12:22
	To: Rasmussen, Tobin <tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com tobin.rasmussen@lumen.com >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Flock camera 
	 

	Toby,

	I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave.  I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves.  Ensurity is also making a program that will work directly with Flock�s cameras.  Flock cameras will be able to track the GPS signal from Ensurity�s trackers and capture digital images as the trackers move around the area of the Flock cameras. 

	 

	Sincerely,

	 

	Aaron Johns

	Detective

	Property Crimes Unit

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Rd

	Eugene OR 97401

	Ph 541-682-5843

	Fax 541-682-6603

thread_messages.subject: Flock camera
thread_messages.body:
Toby,

	I am writing this email to confirm we can get a Flock camera attached to the Lumen pole located between 3045 Royal Ave and 3115 Royal Ave.  I believe these Flock cameras can be a great asset in catching wire thieves.  Ensurity is also making a program that will work directly with Flock�s cameras.  Flock cameras will be able to track the GPS signal from Ensurity�s trackers and capture digital images as the trackers move around the area of the Flock cameras. 

	 

	Sincerely,

	 

	Aaron Johns

	Detective

	Property Crimes Unit

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Rd

	Eugene OR 97401

	Ph 541-682-5843

	Fax 541-682-6603
